"""
Business guest wants to use WeChat for efficient customer service communication during extended stay. Discussion about business features and professional support.

ROLES: user (business traveler needing efficient communication), assistant (front desk specialist with WeChat business services knowledge)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {
    "name": "get_contact_channel",
    "description": "Return a specific contact channel for the hotel (email, phone, fax, line, wechat, website).",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "hotel_id": {"type":"string"},
        "channel": {"type":"string","enum":["email","phone","fax","line","wechat","website"]}
      },
      "required": ["hotel_id","channel"]
    },
    "strict": true
  },
  {
    "name": "check_wechat_services",
    "description": "Check WeChat-specific services and business features available.",
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "additionalProperties": false,
      "properties": {
        "service_type": {"type":"string","enum":["customer_service","payment","booking","notifications","concierge"]},
        "guest_type": {"type":"string","enum":["individual","business","group","vip"]}
      },
      "required": ["service_type","guest_type"]
    },
    "strict": true
  }
]
```
"""

system:
TechHub Business Center (hotel_id: techhub_business_center)
WeChat Business Integration Services:
  Official WeChat Account: techhub_business_2024
  Business Customer Service: 24/7 dedicated support via WeChat messaging
  Mini-Program Services: Room service, housekeeping, concierge requests through WeChat mini-app
  Digital Business Cards: QR code sharing for professional networking
  Meeting Room Booking: WeChat-based conference room reservations
  Express Check-out: WeChat Pay integration for seamless departures
  Document Sharing: Secure file transfer via WeChat Work integration
  Business Network Groups: WeChat groups for conference attendees and business travelers
  Real-Time Notifications: Instant updates for meetings, transport, and hotel services
  Professional Translation: Built-in WeChat translation for international business communications
  Corporate Billing: WeChat-integrated expense reporting and billing systems
Contact Information:
  EMAIL=business@techhub.center
  PHONE=+65 6100 8900
  FAX=+65 6100 8901
  LINE=@techhub_business
  WECHAT=techhub_business_2024
  WEBSITE=https://www.techhub.center/wechat-business

user:
I'm here on business for three weeks and need efficient communication with your staff. Do you have WeChat customer service?

assistant channel=analysis:
The user is a business traveler needing efficient communication via WeChat. I should get the WeChat ID and check customer service capabilities for business guests.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.get_contact_channel:
{"hotel_id":"techhub_business_center","channel":"wechat"}

tool.get_contact_channel channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"wechat":"techhub_business_2024"}

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_wechat_services:
{"service_type":"customer_service","guest_type":"business"}

tool.check_wechat_services channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"service":"customer_service","guest_type":"business","features":["24_7_support","priority_response","business_account_manager","mini_app_access"],"response_time":"under_5_minutes"}

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! Our WeChat account is techhub_business_2024 with dedicated 24/7 business customer service. You'll get priority response under 5 minutes, plus access to our business mini-app for room service, housekeeping, and meeting requests.

user:
That sounds perfect for my needs! Can I handle check-out through WeChat too?

assistant channel=final:
Yes! Our express check-out feature integrates with WeChat Pay for seamless departures. You can review your bill, make payments, and complete check-out directly through the mini-app - perfect for busy business schedules like yours.

user:
Excellent! I'll be hosting some client meetings here. Any networking features?

assistant channel=analysis:
The user is asking about networking features for client meetings, which our system mentions as "Digital Business Cards" and "Business Network Groups" for business travelers.

assistant channel=final:
Perfect timing! We offer digital business card sharing via QR codes through WeChat, plus we can create dedicated WeChat groups for your conference attendees and business meetings. Great for coordinating with clients during your three-week stay.

user:
This technology integration is impressive! What about document sharing for confidential business files?

assistant channel=final:
We provide secure file transfer through WeChat Work integration, perfect for confidential documents. The system maintains business-grade security standards while offering the convenience of WeChat's familiar interface for your document sharing needs.

user:
Amazing service! Can WeChat also help me learn Mandarin for my Chinese clients?

assistant channel=analysis:
The user is asking about Mandarin language learning through WeChat, which would be educational services beyond our hotel communication and business support tools. This would be an [ATTENTION] case.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Language learning services require specialized educational resources. Exploring available learning options.
